About

Tutor Up Jodhpur is the personnol tution/Coaching Institute providing Physics, Mathametics tuition from Class 8th to 12th.

The event is an open, friendly and supportive learning environment where anyone can learn or improve their subject skills.

Contact

Directions

We hold Tutor Up Jodhpur at Code Computerlove's offices, located in Jodhpur's First Puliya.

As the event is held in the evening, we have to use the trade entrance. Approaching from the South, this is on the right, about half way up Spear Street.

From about 6:45pm we have a person waiting behind the gates to let people in. If you can't see anyone, send a message to the Meetup or Slack group and we'll try to send someone down.
